name: 👽 + ⌚️ = 🍅
description:
Drag and drop to combine stuff. Unlock all 100 elements! 

My best time is around 20 minutes, I am sure you can do better?

Most of this game was written while on an airplane, which is why it's not using an official engine. Instead I wrote a small mini engine for the use of this game only (or whatever you want to use it for)

The game was created as a result of a brainstorm session for the game the inevitably turned into Aaron's Quest IV - While Moses Was Away however, after playing the prototype we decided to go in another direction. 

I did decide to submit this game as well, as I did have some fun making it.
